attributes.action: Make publically available all government costs borne by the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather than change existing laws as a "knee jerk" reaction, continue to allow every public servant (from all MP's through to all local government officials) the use of existing expenses responsibly, and allow the public access (via a dedicated website) to decide what's acceptable or not, rather than wait till the previously "hidden" information is leaked.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
